name: Bazarr
check_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker ps --filter 'name=bazarr' --filter 'status=running' --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^bazarr$' && echo active || echo inactive; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker start bazarr 2>/dev/null || docker restart bazarr 2>/dev/null || echo 'Failed to start'; else echo skip; fi
verify_cmd: if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker ps --filter 'name=bazarr' --filter 'status=running' --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^bazarr$' && echo active || echo inactive; else echo skip; fi
